content.rendered: The Foundation has articulated a new Vision, Mission and Core Values. Through a participatory process, the Foundation has also developed its Logic Model including target outcomes at the ultimate, intermediate and short term levels for the strategic period 2012-16, with an enabling outcome of a more effective organisation.

excerpt.rendered: The Foundation has articulated a new Vision, Mission and Core Values. Through a participatory process, the Foundation has also developed its Logic Model including target […]
